title: My ULTIMATE GUIDE to Keyword Ads on Amazon KDP

tactics.name: manual_keyword_targeting
tactics.description: Use manual targeting to select specific keywords for ad campaigns
steps: Enter niche keywords from Amazon search suggestions
Set custom bids for cost control
caveats: High competition keywords may require higher bids
source_quotes: if you can find results that are under a thousand there's a chance of ranking for that search term

tactics.name: Match Type Selection
tactics.description: Choose exact match for specific keywords and phrase match for broader variations to balance targeting and reach.
steps: Add 5 search terms to keyword ads
Disable broad match for precise targeting
Enable phrase match for related keyword variations
Use negative keywords to exclude irrelevant terms
caveats: Suggested bids may not guarantee ad serving
source_quotes: 'exact match type is great for ranking for a specific keyword string'

tactics.name: Bid Adjustment Strategy
tactics.description: Adjust bids for top-of-search placements to compete for higher visibility.
steps: Increase bid by 50% for top-of-search placements
Maintain zero adjustment for rest-of-search and product pages
caveats: Higher bids may not guarantee top placement
source_quotes: 'many of the sales come from those top of search placements'

tactics.name: Break-Even ACOS Calculation
tactics.description: Determine the minimum ACOS threshold for profitability using royalty divided by book price
steps: Multiply result by 100 to get percentage
Set campaign bid to match calculated ACOS
caveats: Ads may not show immediate profitability but aid organic rankings
source_quotes: we need to find out what the break even cost... 24.4% acos

tactics.name: launch_phase_ads
tactics.description: Use keyword ads during book launches to capitalize on new product visibility and ranking potential
steps: Adjust bids daily/weekly based on performance
Prioritize high-competition search terms during launch
caveats: Less effective for highly competitive terms without sufficient sales
source_quotes: using keyword ads even if I just make a few sales... ranks on that first page

heuristics.name: niched_keyword_selection
heuristics.condition: If search volume is under 1,000 results, prioritize these keywords
source_quotes: we need to keep going and having a little look at some different keywords here

heuristics.name: Negative Keyword Optimization
heuristics.condition: If niche-specific terms exist, use negative keywords to exclude irrelevant searches
source_quotes: 'put two negative keywords which are Christmas coloring book for kids'

heuristics.name: Bid Optimization Rule
heuristics.condition: If ACOS is below break-even threshold, increase bids for more impressions
source_quotes: if your AOS is beneath that break even acos... increase your bid

heuristics.name: low_review_boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize ad spend
source_quotes: you might need to make 100 or so sales... you might only need to make say 10 sales

claims.statement: Keyword ads help achieve organic rankings for niche search terms
source_quotes: if I hadn't have used Amazon ads to launch this book it wouldn't be ranking for those search terms

claims.statement: Amazon Ads displays sales figures but not the actual royalty amount per sale.
source_quotes: 'you don't receive all of that $417 if you did that book would be almost break even'

claims.statement: Amazon Ads may not use full daily budget, only a portion of it
source_quotes: Amazon doesn't generally use the whole of your budget

claims.statement: Keyword ads are one of the most important tools for self-publishers
source_quotes: they're one of the most important tools for me as a self-publisher

niche_patterns.example: christmas coloring books + simple design + adult audience
niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience needs with constrained search parameters
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Reduces competition while maintaining search volume
source_quotes: we need to keep going and having a little look at some different keywords here

niche_patterns.description: Target specific seasonal niches with constrained search terms
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Seasonal demand creates temporary market opportunities
source_quotes: we're going to run it up to Christmas Eve
